connect20/upload_check_payment_method.name: connect20/upload_check_payment_method

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/upload_check_payment_method.description: This Free extension adds a new payment method to your Magento store. It is quite similar to Check / Money Order, but allows customers to upload a scanned check as payment proof.
